ygData.subject: Re: Maybe some hope yet
ygData.msgSnippet: My Question is when did you see this posted and are you sure they are referring to Quest armor?  With this last patch they made the drop rate of class specific
ygData.messageBody:
My Question is when did you see this posted and are you sure they are
referring to Quest armor? With this last patch they made the drop rate of
class specific armor in the Planes more frequent. Just don't want anyone to
get hopes up if they are not talking about quest armor

Bree


>From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Maybe some hope yet
>Date: Thu, 9 Dec 1999 16:16:37 -0500 (EST)
>
>They arent going to make stuff easier they are going to make the easy
>stuff harder to get.. LOL.
>
>

>
